content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': "This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the system, I received an error message when trying to clone the repository from 'https://www.rosettastone.com/' to '/path/to/rosetta/stone/' because the destination path already existed and was not an empty directory. I then sent a command to execute the shell with arguments to run the file '/path/to/rosetta/stone/setup.exe' using wine. However, as the computer, I received an error message that wine could not find '/path/to/rosetta/stone/setup.exe'. As instructed, I then sent a command to list the files in the '/path/to/rosetta/stone/download' directory."}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': 'Command list_files returned: []'}, {'role': 'you', 'content': '{"command": {"name": "browse_website", "args": {"url": "https://www.rosettastone.com/", "question": "What is the download link for Rosetta Stone?"}}}'}, {'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text does not provide a download link for Rosetta Stone. It is an advertisement promoting the language learning software and providing information about its benefits, success stories, and different language options. It also highlights the various solutions available for individuals, enterprises, and schools, as well as the company's curriculum, mobile app, and live coaching with native speakers. Links to the company's resources and support portal are provided. \n \n Links: [' (https://www.rosettastone.com/)', 'For Individuals (https://www.rosettastone.com/buy/)', 'For Enterprise (https://www.rosettastone.com/business/)', 'For Schools (https://www.rosettastone.com/schools/)', 'Join Now (https://www.rosettastone.com/subscriptions/)']"}]
"""
